reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best leggings I’ve ever known
reviews.reviewText: So I rarely write reviews but for these leggings I have to.. these are actually the best pair of leggings I have ever put on! They are supportive, squat proof, not see through, flattering to body shape, comfortable, soft, stretchy, no camel toe, the waistband doesn’t roll… need I say more? I bought just the black pair a few years ago and now I have almost every color because no other brand has fit this good. The colors are so cute and unique, I love their neutrals and can wear them to the gym or just casually.Anyways - the price is unbeatable and the quality so worth it. Just be prepared to spend all your money on these!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and flattering
reviews.reviewText: Love this product! I just got it so we’ll see how it holds up, but ya so comfortable, my butt looks great, and the flare is the perfect length. I’m 5’5 150lbs and got a large, my waist is also wider so I have to buy to accommodate that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST LEGGINGS EVERRRR
reviews.reviewText: Whitney Simmons x GymShark DUPE!!! These leggings are incredible bro the v cut stitching on the butt is lifting and cinches your waist to make you look snatched! They kinda roll a little bit but it's not terrible. They're so comfy, so soft, stay in place!! Like they don't fall down halfway through a workout to where you have crotch sag. They also don't give you cameltoe which is super cool. They're so thin and light, but FULL COVERAGE and squat proof (at least this color is). I immediately went and bought three more pairs in other colors and waiting til next paycheck to get the rest of the colors because you CANNOT beat this quality of legging at this price. I got a size M, I'm 5'4" 160 and my measurements are 32" waist 44" hips. They fit perfectly! They look tiny coming out of the package but are super stretchy, but have lots of compression in the belly at the same time. Literally could not be happier!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Don't love this version due to the scrunch, but great customer service.
reviews.reviewText: I bought these after seeing lots of girls in our Fit Finds FB group gush about them. I was never going to spend the money on the WS x GS collection (if I could even snag a pair before they sold out) but loved the look of them, especially the scrunch and laser detail on the back, so I was pretty excited to see this dupe show up and get great reviews.To be transparent, I absolutely adore leggings and have tons of pairs from Amazon, AliExpress, and many other more expensive brands. I wear them every chance I get because I think they are really flattering and comfortable as hell. Aligns or the Amazon Hawthorne/HeyNutz ones that are very similar are my daily go-tos, and I like Wunder Unders or similar slick things for the gym, so that will give you an idea of what I prefer. I'm pretty open to any brand or price, as long as they're great for the gym and/or comfortable and flattering, or just a good lounging pair. I'm normally a black leggings kind of girl but decided to branch out and try this gorgeous GREEN, and then later DANDELION BROWN, and both are super cute. I'd say the colors are true to the picture. They aren't the most cellulite friendly, but I expect that with pretty much any color that isn't black or patterned. I got a MEDIUM in the GREEN pair and a LARGE in the DANDELION BROWN pair. I have pretty consistently been a size medium in leggings for years, but I've recently gained some more weight, so I'm more on the true large side now. I'm 5'3" and I think my measurements are about 43-33-43 (bust-waist-hip) right now, unfortunately, and I'm a 10 or 12 in AE jeans, depending on the pair. That being said, both the medium and large fit me great and about the same, so take that into consideration when trying to determine your size. They are super stretchy.While I think these have potential, these two versions (aka the original with laser detail and newer without it) are just not my thing. Both pairs fit me great, but the scrunch completely stretched out and made me look like I had a slightly wrinkly butt-crack, which is not really the look I was going for. It's hard to tell in my pictures, but I promise, that's what it looked like. I think the scrunch is just too weak and a big butt stretches it out. I've been told that Tom Tiger plans on fixing it, so I have high hopes for future versions! They do help give a little glute separation, so some may love that it's way more subtle than something like the Alphalete Amplifies with their very intense scrunch. I guess I just wanted something a little more in-between.Also, for those of you that hate WAISTBAND SEAMS in leggings, like me, you should note that both versions do have a seam there, but NO ELASTIC BAND! It's just a thin sewn seam around the top of the waistband. I would definitely prefer they find a way to just make it a folded material waistband and do away with the seam, but it doesn't bother me too much, just cuts into my fat a little bit. Due to my short torso, I also have issues with leggings rolling a lot on my waist, and these definitely rolled a bit.I did enjoy the cute laser cutout on the back and the general shapes of the seams, but I found the lack of a front seam, and the higher seams of the front waistband, made my lower tummy area look pooched out. I unfortunately hold some weight there right now so just didn't feel confident in them. If you are lean in your tummy area, that wouldn't be an issue for you, obviously. I wish that waist seam sat a bit lower to give me some compression, but I don't know how that would look.The other thing I didn't love about these is the material. I'm not great at describing this sort of thing, but these are like a super thin but slick material, and they honestly feel a bit cheap. They aren't rough, just not my favorite. I also had some of those line dye marks on the butt and a few on the front and legs of both pairs, as you may be able to spy in the photo of the Green pair. I come across this issue with random leggings on occasion. I assume it has something to do with how they are stored, maybe the dye process, and/or them being folded for extended periods of time in different temperatures so the dye settles in those folds. We'll see if they go away with a wash.Despite the things I didn't love, I do still recommend everyone try these for themselves, and like I said, I have high hopes for future versions. I really like the company, as they are very interested in customer feedback and actually listen to critique. I highly recommend anyone that loves leggings add Tom Tiger (and their sister company, Aurolas) on Instagram and Facebook so you can interact with them. They are very responsive and open to suggestions.TLDR: I got a Medium in Green, Large in Dandelion Brown; both fit about the same. These have a sewn seam without an elastic band around the top of the waistband. The butt-scrunch doesn't really do much but help with some glute separation. The material is thin and kind of slick, feels a bit cheap; not my favorite. They are not cellulite friendly in these two colors, but who cares. While not my fav, I still recommend people try them to see how they feel! We all like different things. I also really like the company.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Black & Red leggings
reviews.reviewText: literally the best!! Not see through at all. Purchased a Medium & both leggings fit perfect! Feel seemless & so buttery soft. I would buy another pair in different colors honest. A lot bette then most brands & good for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These leggings are buttery soft and fit really comfortably. I would love to keep them, but the seams are coming apart straight out of the package. Sadly, will be returning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Makes my dumpy look great especially on lower body days. Super buttery soft! Durable. Had these for years!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve worn them twice & love the fit, quality and style. Received a compliment in the gym & ordered a second pair!!

Me encanta estos Leggins son mis favoritos.El color es muy bello, no se decolora con las lavadas, no se aguada la tela con el uso, no se transparenta nada, calzan perfecto.Asentuan muy bonito el 🍑Son super cómodos y la tela está muy suave y no cambia con el uso. No se me baja de ningún lado pero tampoco aprieta y la talla es justo como viene. Una super opción para Leggins de ejercicio quiero mas colores.

reviews.reviewTitle: So comfy, stretchy and squat proof ! & No front seam !!!!
reviews.reviewText: 150lbs — 5’5”— size 8-10 (I got size medium)Love these leggings, the color, fabric and fit.I’ve since purchased 5 more colors and 6 colors in the shorts version.There is no front seam !! 🙌🏻They are thin but squat proof and have only rolled down a little when I’m stretching at the end of my workout.They make your butt look great without going up your crack 😂 however you can hike them up if you desire that effect.I live in leggings and the gym, have purchased many brands of leggings over the years and these are my favourite leggings from Amazon or any store for that matter (including Lulu!) so far.My only negative is that coffee and dandelion brown look so similar that you’re better off with one or the other, otherwise it’s so hard to tell them apart people will think you are wearing them again 😂 🤷🏻‍♀️

Por mucho tiempo quise comprar estos leggings pero me daba un poco de miedo, al final lo hice y me encantaron.Lo primero que noté es que se ven muy pequeños pero estiran demasiado, la tela es muy suave y se adapta muy bonito al cuerpo, son como una segunda piel. Además, no se meten en áreas incómodas 😅Yo compré el paquete de dos leggings que por el precio creo que vale mucho la pena.Los recomiendo mucho, pronto volveré a comprar otros colores.

i am so happy with these pants, the ends aren’t too long, they are super comfy (not too tight) and the waist band isn’t lose. i am 5’2 and have muscular legs yet these pants complimented my body type so well. usually flares are way too long

The only problem I had with my leggings was the material, it’s buttery, it feels AMAZING but it’s kinda thin. The leggings seems to be squat proof at least for now but the panty lines will be very much visible because the material is so thin. I loved that these leggings had a triangle shape on the back and no freaking thong simulation. Overall they are very flattering and they create hourglass silhouette
